attributes.action: Scrap the escallating Humber Bridge Tolls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Humber bridge tolls are a tax on Hospital patients, a deterrant to the 
South Bank Industrial development,
Tourism in the area, Jobs etc. Plus, The Humber Bridge Tolls are the highest charges in the whole of the UK.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the escallating Humber Bridge Tolls."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14972.asp

Prime Minister's Office
